name: Dozo Prototype
description:
Lolo clone but you're a Bulldozer!

Use W and S to move the left tread forwards and backwards.

Arrow keys Up and Down to move right tread forwards and backwards.

One tread forwards and one tread backwards spins you in place!

Push boulders onto the switch blocks to open the exit. Touching the lasers makes you die and restart the game.

email me at chris.d.woods@gmail.com and tell me if this should be polished and released as a real game or if there's anything you'd change or add. Thanks for playing!
